author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Iqvia Sees Q1 2018 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.23 To $1.30
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Iqvia Holdings Inc:
* IQVIA REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS, ISSUES FIRST-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.02 * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.23 TO $1.30 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.40 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $2.42 BILLION TO $2.47 BILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 10.7 PERCENT TO $2.161 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.34, REVENUE VIEW $2.14 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.20, REVENUE VIEW $2.04 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
